meanings.sent1: The teacher gave an approved stamp on my homework.
meanings.sent2: The approved document was ready for submission.
meanings.sent3: The approved cake was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The approved plan sailed through without any hitches.
meanings.sent5: The approved painting was displayed in the gallery.

meanings.definition: Found to be satisfactory or acceptable
meanings.sent1: She wore the approved outfit to the event.
meanings.sent2: The approved proposal was implemented successfully.
meanings.sent3: The approved joke had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: His approved performance stole the show.
meanings.sent5: The approved decision brought peace to the team.
